OOC: OK, once and for all, the order is Me, Rdahl, Dcoburn, rauq, and 
Soulstice. Each of us posts two times.

:::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

::His eyes light up at the prospect of destroying the Trainers and proving he 
and his team's worth in battle::
Ramjet: DESTRONS! Drillbit is inviting us to battle!
::He and my other Destrons walk out of the Blackfortress, transform to their 
flight modes, and head to the CF.  On the way they look back to see if the 
others were following::

--part1_68.d9d8076.28025b49_boundary
